title: Design-Based Research-Informed Blended Education Curriculum for Engineering Laboratory Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic engineering concepts and experience using laboratory equipment
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning course combining e-learning materials and actual laboratory sessions for nanotechnology field experiments. Construction of blended learning environments using learners' personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can explain nanotechnology laboratory safety protocols and standard operating procedures (SOPs) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can develop prototypes to solve laboratory problems using the Design-Based Research (DBR) methodology at least twice.
Learners can analyze e-learning content and experimental data to write engineering problem-solving reports in APA format.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
